The iPad 2 is amazing!

node.title: Apple iPad 2 Keynote

node.description: Drawing from some of the most pivotal points in his life, Steve Jobs, chief executive officer and co-founder of Apple Computer and of Pixar Animation Studios, urged graduates to pursue their dreams and see the opportunities in life's setbacks.
node.title: Steve Jobs' 2005 Stanford Commencement Address

node.description: Here we see Steve Jobs & the almost bankrupt at the time Apple Computer making a temporary deal with Bill Gates & Microsoft. The crowd was not too happy about it.
node.title: Macworld Boston 1997-The Microsoft Deal
